docs.title: How to Create a Product in Ordeez: A Step-by-Step Guide
docs.text: Unlock the potential of your Ordeez store by effortlessly adding products to captivate your customers. Follow this detailed guide to create a product with ease and precision:

docs.title: 1. Access the Dashboard and Initiate Product Creation
docs.text:
• Sign in to your Ordeez account to access the dashboard.
  • Navigate to the left-hand menu and select Products.
  • Click the Create Product button to begin.

📸 Screenshot:

docs.title: 2. Enter Product Details
docs.text:
• You’re now on the product details page. Start by entering a compelling product name. For this example, let’s use "Cardano - Italian Shoes" to highlight an elegant footwear line.
  • Provide a detailed description to entice customers, emphasizing quality and style.

📸 Screenshot:

docs.title: 3. Configure Variants, Options, and Visibility
docs.text:
• Enhance your product by adding variants and options, such as sizes (e.g., 38, 39, 40) and colors (e.g., black, tan).
  • Adjust the Visibility settings: Make it Visible to publish now or Hidden until ready.

📸 Screenshots:

docs.title: 4. Assign a Category
docs.text:
• Every product needs at least one category.
  • Choose an existing category or create a new one. For this example: Create a category called "Classic" and select it.

📸 Screenshot:

docs.title: 5. Set Pricing Details
docs.text:
• Enter the original price and a discounted price to attract buyers.
  • For example: Original Price: $175 Discounted Price: $120

📸 Screenshots:

docs.title: 6. Save and Publish
docs.text:
• Once all fields are completed, click the Save button in the top corner.
  • Your "Cardano - Italian Shoes" is now live on your Ordeez store, ready for customers to explore via WhatsApp!

🎉 You're done!

docs.title: Setting Up Your Store
docs.text:
Here’s how to set up your Ordeez store.

  1. Go to ordeez.ai
  2. Click Sign Up
  3. Fill in your store info
